title: Hol1Wood
author: Hol1Wood
content: Best OTC Come to or chat! You can buy and sell all what you want! https://t.me/HollyCryptoOTC

comments.author: s1lverbox
comments.body: Sketchy looking group.Only one Admin with no trust or feedback what so ever available for escrow.Group just poped out with message "test" from main admin. Be careful and do not believe without proper checks.

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Quote from: Hol1Wood on November 21, 2022, 02:25:02 PMBest OTC Come to or chat! You can buy and sell all what you want! https://t.me/HollyCryptoOTCSo you have only 8 people in your group and all of them are OTC traders?Who will be the escrow there? You?What is the total portfolio that your team holds and in what crypto? Or you only have BTC?Will you provide a signed message to the interested parties from the address where you hold your coins at?
